text:
I've successfully installed (with _Pkg.add_) the ArcadeLearningEnvironment.jl, but when I try `using ArcadeLearningEnvironment`, I get this error:
`ERROR: LoadError: LoadError: Cannot locate '(Julia)Artifacts.toml' file when attempting to use artifact 'atari_roms' in 'ArcadeLearningEnvironment'`
How can I fix it?

elements.text: ) the ArcadeLearningEnvironment.jl, but when I try
ERROR: LoadError: LoadError: Cannot locate '(Julia)Artifacts.toml' file when attempting to use artifact 'atari_roms' in 'ArcadeLearningEnvironment'

text: Someone seems to have had a similar problem on Julia 1.3.1 <https://github.com/JuliaLang/Pkg.jl/issues/1705|here>. Does that help?

elements.text: Someone seems to have had a similar problem on Julia 1.3.1

text: I don't think so.. The problem was about https protocol. But, thank you!!
